snippet.title: How to Shift Your Perception and Accelerate Your Evolution (SoulTalk Ep. 78)
snippet.description:
Humanity as a whole is facing really challenging times on all fronts, environmental, political and social issues all over the world. In this insightful episode with Daniel Schmachtenberger, evolutionary philosopher and systems designer, he shares with us how a shift in the way we ask questions could lead to a new civilization that does not cause all the problems that we have today. How we can learn a different way of solving issues by changing the incentives and walking a mile in someone elseâ€™s shoes. 

In This Episode You Will Learn:

-The main reason humanity needs a new problem solving process.
-The first thing to do when trying to solve a problem that affects any number of people.
-One of the most potent exercises you can do from a spiritual perspective.
-How technology can promote new economic thinking.
-The most important thing to focus on in education. 

If you want more life-changing tips and motivation subscribe to the channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/kuteblackson?sub_confirmation=1
